products.title: Devon Stripe Dove Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Light in colourway and incredibly stylish, this devon stripe dove roman blind is a fresh addition to any scheme, especially those trendy, soft grey ones.  The woven stripes are just a touch wider than pinstripe, creating a pattern that's modern, cool and always on style.
products.productdescription: Light in colourway and incredibly stylish, this devon stripe dove roman blind is a fresh addition to any scheme, especially those trendy, soft grey ones.  The woven stripes are just a touch wider than pinstripe, creating a pattern that's modern, cool and always on style.

products.title: Devonshire, Cream - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Devonshire, cream - roman blind generate sophisticated style in your home by including the devonshire in cream, where a blend of fine fibers merge to create a modern blind with a subtle texture and relaxed fall, in an elegant cream shade.Layer t
products.productdescription: Generate sophisticated style in your home by including the devonshire in cream, where a blend of fine fibers merge to create a modern blind with a subtle texture and relaxed fall, in an elegant cream shade.Layer the cream with taupe, caramel, and biscuit tones to create an appealing and classy window display in your master bedroom, incorporating fresh cream linens for contrast, and alike, delicately textured throws and cushions for a refined finish. And, for a hint of luxurious character, why not add a touch of gold?Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.
